feed.title: Category: underware | Junk I Would Otherwise Forget

entry.title: How to ensure your underware is warm and toasty and ready for you in the morning
entry.content:
Two ways:

  • Get your spouse to microwave it. Careful about burning if synthetic.
  • Put it in your dog's bed. In the morning, excavate from under dog. Your dog will be happy as dogs need a job.
